attributes.action: Scrap the Ludicrous System by Where Victims of Miscarriages of Justice Are Forced to Pay for Their Time in Prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Evil criminals who re-offend constantly are given free time in prison at the taxpayer's expense while innocent people are forced to pay, this is ridiculous. Innocent people who are sent to prison should recieve 100% compensation tax-free and recieve a full public apology from whoever sent them to prison.
